00041         public static int BoolToInt(bool Input)
00042         {
00043             return Input ? 1 : 0;
00044         }

00051         public static bool IntToBool(int Input)
00052         {
00053             return Input > 0 ? true : false;
00054         }

00061         public static string IntToDay(int DayOfWeek)
00062         {
00063             switch (DayOfWeek)
00064             {
00065                 case 1:
00066                     return "Sunday";
00067                 case 2:
00068                     return "Monday";
00069                 case 3:
00070                     return "Tuesday";
00071                 case 4:
00072                     return "Wednesday";
00073                 case 5:
00074                     return "Thursday";
00075                 case 6:
00076                     return "Friday";
00077                 case 7:
00078                     return "Saturday";
00079             }
00080             return "";
00081         }
00082 
00088         public static int DayToInt(string DayOfWeek)
00089         {
00090             switch (DayOfWeek)
00091             {
00092                 case "Sunday":
00093                     return 1;
00094                 case "Monday":
00095                     return 2;
00096                 case "Tuesday":
00097                     return 3;
00098                 case "Wednesday":
00099                     return 4;
00100                 case "Thursday":
00101                     return 5;
00102                 case "Friday":
00103                     return 6;
00104                 case "Saturday":
00105                     return 7;
00106             }
00107             return 0;
00108         }

00191         public static string Base64ToString(string Input)
00192         {
00193             try
00194             {
00195                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00196                     return "";
00197                 byte[] TempArray = Convert.FromBase64String(Input);
00198                 return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(TempArray);
00199             }
00200             catch { throw; }
00201         }
00202 
00208         public static string StringToBase64(string Input)
00209         {
00210             try
00211             {
00212                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00213                     return "";
00214                 byte[] TempArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Input);
00215                 return Convert.ToBase64String(TempArray);
00216             }
00217             catch { throw; }
00218         }
